properties.entry: SELECT SHIP_NO FROM SHIPPING_ADDRESS WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
INSERT INTO ORDERS VALUES( SEQ_ORDER_NO.NEXTVAL , 3000 , '요청사항 없음' , ? , SYSDATE , 'Y' , ? , '카카오페이' , 'Y' , ? , ? , ? , '배송준비중' )
SELECT COUNT(ORDER_NO) CNT FROM ORDERS WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?

SELECT ORDER_NO , ORDER_STATUS , ORDER_DATE , LISTAGG(ITEM_NAME, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY ITEM_NAME) AS ITEM_LIST , LISTAGG(ITEM_IMG.ITEM_IMG_PATH, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY ITEM_IMG.ITEM_IMG_PATH) AS ITEM_IMG_PATH , SUM(ROUND(ITEM_PRICE * (1-ITEM_DISCOUNT), -1) * ORDER_ITEM) AS TOTAL_PRICE FROM ORDERS JOIN ITEM_LIST USING (ORDER_NO) JOIN ITEM I USING (ITEM_CODE) JOIN ITEM_IMG ON ITEM_CODE = ITEM_IMG_CODE WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? GROUP BY ORDER_NO, ORDER_STATUS, ORDER_DATE ORDER BY ORDER_NO DESC

SELECT MAX(PRICE) AS MAX_PRICE , MAX(ITEM_IMG_PATH) AS ITEM_IMG_PATH FROM ITEM_LIST JOIN ITEM_IMG ON ITEM_CODE = ITEM_IMG_CODE JOIN ITEM ON ITEM_LIST.ITEM_CODE = ITEM.ITEM_CODE JOIN ORDERS O USING (ORDER_NO) WHERE O.MEMBER_NO = ?

INSERT INTO ITEM_LIST (ITEM_LIST_NO, ORDER_ITEM, PRICE, ORDER_NO, ITEM_CODE) SELECT SEQ_ILNO.NEXTVAL, C.CART_STOCK, C.PRICE, O.ORDER_NO, C.ITEM_CODE FROM CART C INNER JOIN ORDERS O ON C.MEMBER_NO = O.MEMBER_NO WHERE C.MEMBER_NO = ? AND O.ORDER_STATUS = '배송완료' AND O.ORDER_NO = (select MAX(T.ORDER_NO) from ORDERS T where C.MEMBER_NO = T.MEMBER_NO)

SELECT IL.ITEM_LIST_NO AS ITEM_LIST_NO , IL.ORDER_ITEM AS QUANTITY , IL.PRICE AS PRICE , IL.ORDER_NO AS ORDER_NO , II.ITEM_IMG_PATH AS ITEM_IMG , O.DELIVERY_FEE AS DELIVERY_FEE , O.REQUEST AS REQUEST , O.RES_PHONE AS PHONE , O.ORDER_DATE AS ORDER_DATE , O.TRACKING_NO AS TRACKING_NO , O.PAYMENT_NO AS PAMENT , O.PAYMENT_STATUS AS PAYMENT_STATUS , O.MEMBER_NO AS MEMBER_NO , O.SHIP_NO AS SHIP_NO , O.PAYMENT_AMOUNT AS TOTAL_PRICE , O.ORDER_STATUS AS ORDER_STATUS , M.NAME AS NAME , M.GRADE_NO AS GRADE , S.SHIP_ADDR AS ADDRESS , IM.ITEM_NAME AS ITEM_NAME FROM ITEM_LIST IL INNER JOIN ITEM_IMG II ON IL.ITEM_CODE = II.ITEM_IMG_CODE INNER JOIN ORDERS O ON IL.ORDER_NO = O.ORDER_NO INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON O.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO INNER JOIN SHIPPING_ADDRESS S ON O.SHIP_NO = S.SHIP_NO INNER JOIN ITEM IM ON IL.ITEM_CODE = IM.ITEM_CODE WHERE O.MEMBER_NO = ? AND O.ORDER_NO = ?
